@VodafoneUK - I just want to buy a Sim. Two weeks, 6 calls, 4 web chats, hours wasted and you can‚Äôt help me!

@VodafoneUK That info is about phone contracts. 
This was broadband. 
I understand a soft search to verify personal information, but hard searches are for large credit applications, like mortgages & car finance. 
You have no need for a full copy of my credit report. 
I will be cancelling.
